channel.title: Java Heap Space
channel.description: I keep getting a Java heap space error out of memory thing. This never happened before. I switched my router and reinstalled xampp, and it started happening. Then, I switched my old router back, and it seemed to help a little bit. I think it's because I use savegame when they gain exp. I got the heap space even before I put when you gain exp. So, I still took it out anyway and put it in my timed message. Now, it might be my mysql, because when I used to connect my server to my website's host I would get disconnected a lot. My hiscores, auto update exp, and when you use vote4cash it automatically gives you your cash. Anyone know why I keep getting it now? It's usually something like this, I keep forgetting to copy the code, because people actually play my server. :|[code]Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.nio.ByteBuffer.allocate(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.forOutputStreamWriter(Unknown Source) at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Java Heap Space
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Deltascape, found a code when I got home. Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from 0wn3. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:26059) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:290) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.savegame(client.java:26937) at client.process(client.java:25119) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:289) at process.run(process.java:14) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic

item.title: Java Heap Space
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Are you using some derivative of Project Insanity? You’re probably experiencing the widely experienced memory leak that all poorly programmed sources have. Now I’m not saying what you’ve written is poorly programmed but what you began with probably was.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Heap Space
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

I keep getting a Java heap space error out of memory thing. This never happened before. I switched my router and reinstalled xampp, and it started happening. Then, I switched my old router back, and it seemed to help a little bit. I think it’s because I use savegame when they gain exp. I got the heap space even before I put when you gain exp. So, I still took it out anyway and put it in my timed message. Now, it might be my mysql, because when I used to connect my server to my website’s host I would get disconnected a lot. My hiscores, auto update exp, and when you use vote4cash it automatically gives you your cash. Anyone know why I keep getting it now? It’s usually something like this, I keep forgetting to copy the code, because people actually play my server. Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.nio.HeapByteBuffer.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.nio.ByteBuffer.allocate(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.nio.cs.StreamEncoder.forOutputStreamWriter(Unknown Source) at java.io.OutputStreamWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source)
